SEARCH
Package net.elena.murat.util

Class ColorUtil

java.lang.Object
net.elena.murat.util.ColorUtil
public final class ColorUtil extends Object
Utility class for RGB color operations. All methods work exclusively with RGB components (alpha channel is ignored). Results are always fully opaque (alpha=255).
